overview: Grant Kirkwood joined PacketExchange in February 2010 following the acquisition of Mzima Networks, of which he was the founder and CTO. Grantâ€™s role from Mzima continues with PacketExchange as he oversees all aspects of the company’s technology vision and execution, focused on a high level commitment to customer care. Grant brings to PacketExchange over 10 years of senior management experience including Netixs where he operated its managed services and hosting operation and Vision Imaging, where he built the company’s network backbone and geographically-dispersed server farms. Mr. Kirkwood is a member of the World Affairs Council and the British American Business Council, and a patron of Global Impact.
